speaker: Coach
text: We have a tough match coming up. I need you focused. What's your mindset?

options.response: That's what I like to hear. Discipline wins games.
Fear is natural. Use it. Don't let it control you.

speaker: Teammate
text: Hey! A few of us are staying late for batting practice. Want to join?

options.response: Ah, okay. Rest up for the game.

speaker: Coach
text: Your grades dipped below the school standard. Until you fix this, you're off the field.

options.response: Good. Show me you're as serious in the classroom as you are on the mound.
Then prove it by earning the right to wear the jersey again.

speaker: Captain
text: You've been carrying the team lately. Still, the next opponent lives on mistakes.

options.response: That's our ace. Keep your head clear and trust your stuff.
Middle of their order feasts on fastballs. Mix it up.

speaker: Captain
text: You're pressing too hard. We need you steady, not perfect.

options.response: Good. Execute the simple plays and confidence follows.

options.text: Maybe someone else should take the spotlight...
options.response: Not happening. You're here for a reason. Rise to it.

speaker: Rival
text: Heard you're starting again. Hope your nerves can handle nine innings against me.

options.text: I'll shut you down, like always.
options.response: Then come prove it. I brought extra strikeout celebrations.
Fine by me. I like when the crowd holds its breath.

speaker: Rival
text: Look tired already. Maybe the bench is more your speed tonight.

options.text: Keep talking. I'll do the hitting.
options.response: Big words. Make sure the bat leaves your shoulder.

options.text: I'm saving my energy for the clutch.
options.response: We'll see how calm you are with runners on.

speaker: Announcer
text: The crowd is chanting your name as you stare in for the sign. They can feel the moment tilting your way.

options.response: You breathe deep, letting the roar turn into rhythm.

speaker: Announcer
text: The stadium is deadly silent. Every fan is frozen, waiting to see if you can flip the script in the bottom of the ninth.

options.response: You nod once. The only sound left is your heartbeat.
